edu.umd.cs.psl.application.groundkernelstore

Class MemoryGroundKernelStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.groundkernelstore.MemoryGroundKernelStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroundKernelStore
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanMaxWalkSat, BooleanMCSat

    public class MemoryGroundKernelStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements GroundKernelStore
    A simple GroundKernelStore that just stores each GroundKernel in memory.

    No action is taken by changedGroundKernel(GroundKernel).

      • changedGroundKernel

        public void changedGroundKernel(GroundKernel gk)
        Description copied from interface: GroundKernelStore
        Notifies this store that a GroundKernel was changed.

        Any component that modifies a GroundKernel in this store should call this method.

        Specified by:
        changedGroundKernel in interface GroundKernelStore
        Parameters:
        gk - the changed GroundKernel

      • changedGroundKernelWeight

        public void changedGroundKernelWeight(GroundCompatibilityKernel k)
        Description copied from interface: GroundKernelStore
        Notifies this store that a GroundCompatibilityKernel's weight was changed.

        This method should be called whenever the weight of a GroundCompatibilityKernel in this store is changed, or the weight of its parent CompatibilityKernel is changed (and the GroundCompatibilityKernel's weight is still tied to it).

        It is not necessary to also call GroundKernelStore.changedGroundKernel(GroundKernel) if only the weight was changed.

        Specified by:
        changedGroundKernelWeight in interface GroundKernelStore
        Parameters:
        k - the ground kernel with a changed weight

      • changedGroundKernelWeights

        public void changedGroundKernelWeights()
